Judul: Automatic Segmentation Technology of Space Architec ture Image  Based on Space Adaptive Clustering Algorithm
Abstrak:
Interior furnishing design actually is the construction interior space design, an organic part 
of the whole building, a continuation of the architectural design, a manifestation of deepening the 
concept of architectural space.This article elaborates on the close relationship between furnishing 
design and interior design, contents and  the important role of furnishing design classification.
Kata Kunci: Image Information System; Brightness; Optical Prop erties; Spectral Sensitivity Curves;  Image Segmentation; Intelligent Home Furnishing
Sumber: Guangdong University of Petrochemical Technology ,  525000, Maoming, China
